text: @EricTrump @realDonaldTrump Since the WH didn't act on Intel briefings concerning the COVID-19 pandemic and I'm sure other intel briefings. It's time to read in the goverers so they are given the same intel briefings given to president and Congress. It's time to be proactive vs reactive.
